name: Spurpent
description:
***ATTENTION***

There is a  bug where if the game is played on Microsoft Edge the snake swallowing itself effect doesn't work. Please use Firefox or Chrome.  Sorry for the inconvenience.

You are a cowboy trapped in the body of an Ouroboros snake. You must run before
being consumed while avoiding deadly acid or falling off course.

Controls are D to go right and Space to jump.

I intended to have enemies spawning on the platforms but couldn't get that finished in time.

This was my first time really getting into 2D and learned quite a bit and know where I need improvement for future games.

The game is no where near complete but I was reaching the end of the jam and was too exhausted to continue.

I have an updated version that fixes the issue with music only playing on the left speaker and also added a scoring system, which will be uploaded after the jam ends.
